issues.message: Introduce a new variable or use its initial value before reassigning 'expected'.
Merge this if statement with the enclosing one.
Introduce a new variable or use its initial value before reassigning 'ansible_test'.

Introduce a new variable or use its initial value before reassigning 'current_if'.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal '/etc/group' 8 times.
Introduce a new variable or use its initial value before reassigning 'namespace'.
Refactor this function to reduce its Cognitive Complexity from 25 to the 15 allowed.
Remove or refactor this statement; it has no side effects.
Take the required action to fix the issue indicated by this "FIXME" comment.
